channel.title: Blogs on Nischal Shrestha
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Nischal Shrestha

item.title: Learning learnr: a primer.
item.description: I wrote a blog post on the RStudio Education blog about how to reason about the learnr. I outline the basic architecture and the tech stacks involved with learnr and a “simple” way to think about the package. In the second post, I will dive into the details behind the experience adding multi-language support, and setup code chaining. I will also talk about recent Python challenges for exercise checking in the third post, so keep an eye out!
